Name: storagenode-v3
Overview: This is official Storj V3 node client. To participate you must first have to have an authorization token, to get the Authentication Token go to: [b]https://storj.io/sign-up-farmer[/b]
ExtraParams: -e SETUP=true --mount type=bind,source="/mnt/user/[your identity directory]/identity/storagenode/",destination=/app/identity  --mount type=bind,source="/mnt/user/[your storage directory]/",destination=/app/config

emailaddress.Name: Email address
emailaddress.Description: Email address used to sign Storj V3 node. (recommended)

internetaddress.Name: Internet Address
internetaddress.Description: Your ISP IP address:28967 (static IP) or dynamic DNS address here.

allocatedstorage.Name: Allocated Storage
allocatedstorage.Description: A minimum of 500GB with no maximum of available space per node.  Preferred minimum of 8TB and maximum of 24TB of available space per node.

bandwidth.Name: Bandwidth
bandwidth.Description: (OPTIONAL) Amount of  bandwidth used, per month, to Storj network.  According to Storj documentation, minimum is 2TB, recommended is 16+ TB, preferred is unlimited (e.g. 100000TB).

dashboardport.Name: Dashboard Port
dashboardport.Description: The port to access web dashboard
